alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 30 at 7:45PM MDT until March 31 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Winds will decrease overnight. West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible on Friday. * WHERE...Curry County, De Baca County, and Roosevelt County. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust may cause low visibility on area highways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility may be restricted in blowing dust.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; De Baca County; Roosevelt County
